name: ElmahIoDeploymentNotification
description: Notifies elmah.io on every deployment on Azure DevOps.
author: elmah.io

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input your elmah.io API key located on the organization settings page.

inputs.name: logId
inputs.label: Log ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the deployment should show on a single log only, set the ID of the log here.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override to pick a custom naming scheme for your versions. Must be a valid PowerShell string.
